flavorText: Those who cross the Dimir find enemies everywhere they turn.

foreignData.flavorText: Wer sich mit den Dimir anlegt, macht sich überall Feinde.
foreignData.name: Manipulation der Massen
foreignData.text: Übernimm die Kontrolle über X Kreaturen und/oder Planeswalker deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Quienes hacen enfadar a los dimir se topan con enemigos allá donde vayan.
foreignData.name: Manipulación masiva
foreignData.text: Gana el control de X criaturas y/o planeswalkers objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Ceux qui dupent les Dimir trouvent des ennemis à chaque tournant.
foreignData.name: Manipulation de masse
foreignData.text: Acquérez le contrôle de X cibles, créatures et/ou planeswalkers.

foreignData.flavorText: Chi ostacola i Dimir scopre di avere nemici ovunque si volti.
foreignData.name: Manipolazione di Massa
foreignData.text: Prendi il controllo di X creature e/o planeswalker bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: ディミーアに逆らう者はどちらを向いても敵に遭う。
foreignData.name: 集団強制
foreignData.text: クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカー合わせてＸ体を対象とし、それらのコントロールを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 디미르를 적으로 돌리는 자들은 이내 사방에 적이 깔려 있다는 것을 알게 된다.
foreignData.name: 대량 조작
foreignData.text: 생물 및/또는 플레인즈워커 X개를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표들의 조종권을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Os que se opõem aos Dimir encontram inimigos para onde quer que se voltem.
foreignData.name: Manipulação em Massa
foreignData.text: Ganhe o controle de X criaturas e/ou planeswalkers alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Те, кто встает на пути у Димиров, встречают врагов за каждым поворотом.
foreignData.name: Управление Массами
foreignData.text: Получите контроль над X целевыми существами и (или) planeswalker-ами.

foreignData.flavorText: 反抗底密尔的人会发现自己四面皆敌。
foreignData.name: 全面操弄
foreignData.text: 获得X个目标生物和／或鹏洛客的操控权。

foreignData.flavorText: 反抗底密爾的人會發現自己四面皆敵。
foreignData.name: 全面操弄
foreignData.text: 獲得X個目標生物和／或鵬洛客的操控權。

name: Mass Manipulation
originalText: Gain control of X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

rulings.text: The control-change effect of Mass Manipulation lasts indefinitely. It doesn’t wear off during the cleanup step.
In a multiplayer game, if a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well, and any effects that give the player control of permanents immediately end.

text: Gain control of X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.
